content: i ve seen so many of these around and just knew i needed to make one the problem i always seemed to come across was that i don t love a point on the back of my hood and they also seemed to have a tighter fit than i would like so after looking at a few of them up close i attempted to create something that fit exactly what i was looking for as a bonus i created a matching pair of mittens to go with it i won t ever charge for this pattern because i am not so original to think i thought all of this up on my own someone came up with the original idea and that certainly wasn t me i just made it work for me
